DataElement.preferredName: Quality of Life Moderate Exercise Performed Assessment Week Frequency
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of times moderate exercise, activity that requires moderate physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness, was performed within any period of seven consecutive days as a subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Quality of Life Moderate Exercise Performed Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to moderate exercise, activity that requires a elevated level of physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness, as a subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.:Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.:Performed; carried out.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.
Executed and carried through to completion.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number of occurrences of something within any period of seven consecutive days.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any period of seven consecutive days.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
